title: Grimm Douwa: Watanabe Yaoyoi Sakuhinshuu 1
original_name: グリム童話 渡辺やよい 作品集
sinopse:
1. Jotei Shirayukihime: Fukushuu no Aiyoku Nikutai Houshi (Empress Snow White)
2. Rapunzel: Ten ni Hibiku Amai Aegi
3. Tsugumi no Hige no Ousama: Kutsujoku no Nikutai Houshi (King Thrushbeard)
4. Akuma no Koi: Ore no Mono ni Nare! (Love of the Devil)
5. Marlene-hime: Toraware no Iinari-hime (Maid Maleen)
6. Fukushuu no Nadeshiko: Kyouran no Jikoai (Pink of Revenge)
